name: popup_it
description:
use regexp to match line pattern
then auto popup complete menu.
default support c c.gtk tex html css javascript 

"             let g:usrPopup= {}
"             let s:usrPopup["type"] = [
"                         \ {'cmd'     : "\<c-n>",
"                         \  'pattern' : ['xx', 'yy'],
"                         \  'exclude' : ['zz'],
"                         \ },
"                         \{item2}
"                         \{item3}
"                         \]
install_details: Put this file in your VIM plugins dir

versions.release_notes:
Let input more smooth
Set autopopup delay time.

let g:PopupDelayTime=400  
put it to .vimrc (ms)
